title: Itay Gross Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Itay Gross? Check out all of Itay Gross's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogItay Gross Senior Social Media Manager Itay Gross Itay is the Senior Social Media Manager at Similarweb. His background in content creation stretches for almost a decade and ranges from television to production, publishing, and social media. He is passionate about storytelling and utilizing creative ideas to drive business results. Besides his work at Similarweb, Itay is also the author of children's books and loves nature, music, and sports.
